Articles.Content:
This is a Boeing 747 that i have made

its a bit rough on take off but is really fun

also dont accelerate too quickly because it will explode (especially on launch)

you will need version 0.13 and above to get this craft

The only mods you will need is c7 ans nova punch

Here is a video i made of it

 [https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!159&id=99F104C10E21B212%21159#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21160](https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!159&id=99F104C10E21B212%21159#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21160)
